thread.title: Kimberley Denham
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Kimberley Denham

author: Kimberley Denham
title: Kimberley Denham
text:
I was hesitant to buy sunglasses from an online site, concerns being that I may end up paying a lot for a fake knock off.. But I did my research and saw all of the positive reviews and decided to take the chance. I am very happy to say that Otticanet exceeded my expectations. Absolutely genuine Raybans!
I was also super impressed with the fact that I ordered my frames on Tuesday 7th March in Australia and they were delivered to my door in under than a week!
Very pleased and will be recommending Otticanet to friends and family.
